snippet: Jerome Liebling dug deeply into his subjects, using still photography almost like film; an exhibition of his work will run starting March 13.
abstract: Images by Jerome Liebling, mid-century photographer who displayed particular ability for capturing pathos in his subjects, will be on view at Steven Kasher Gallery beginning in March; Liebling was member of the Photo League, a group of socially minded photographers that disbanded in 1951.
lead_paragraph: Jerome Liebling dug deeply into his subjects, using still photography almost like film; an exhibition of his work will run starting March 13.
